div.p:
Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
per balliuos eiusdem xi die mensis Aprilis Anno Domini et cetera nonogesimo
primo Quo die sectis vocatis et Curia affirmata Absentes
patent in Rotulo Secte

The samyn day Comperit Symon' bannerman of Wattirtone one that
ane part Ande Jonhne fraser one that vthir part In presens of the court and grantit
thame til abide and vndirlie the ordinance of thir personis Alexander menyeis
Alexander rede Jonhne colisone William oudny of that Ilk and Androw murray
eldar suorne tharto anent the clames of xxti bollis of malt and meile
and iiijor merkis of fermis and maile of the landis of torrinschow
clamyt and follouit be the said' Symond' apon' the said' Jhone'
gif the personis forsaid' cane appont and aggre tham amicabilie
tharintile And' falyeinge tharof thai partiis forsaid' sal comper
before the aldirman and balyeis of abirdene one friday that next
Cumis be tham self or thar procuratoris to haue decisione in the said matir
as law will but delay

Eodem die Symon bannerman de Wattirtone fecit Constituit creauit
et nominavit Johannem Colison suum legittimum procuratorem in actione debatabili inter
ipsum et Johannem fraser promitten' de Rato et grato in vberiore forma
procuratorij

The samyn day it was decret be ane suorne assis' Alexander chamer
of murchill forspekar that Williame Wormet sal supercede the
pament of xv hidis quhilkis Will gray hed' of his quhill the
barbora cum hame and at hir hayme cumyne the said' Will gray
sal mak compt rekning and pament of the said' hidis to the
saide William Wormet as he cane preyf that wthir merchandis
tuk for thar hidis of that samyn rays' Ande that the saide Wilyeam
Wormetis aventour is gane of the samyn

The saide day Androw murray eldar follouit Roule yanson'
mastir vndir god of ane schip Callit the James of Campver'
for the skatht sustenit of ane boyt of maluasy that the hede
was out or it was laide apone the key of abirdene quhilk
was put tile the decisione of ane assis' of Suorne personis
with consent of the said' partiis quhilkis riplie avisit deliuerit
be the moutht of alexander chamer of murchill forspekar of the
said' assis' and fand' the said' Roule quyt of the saide
Androus clame and challance of the tynsal of the said'
boyt and wyne And' the saide Androu in Amerciament of the court
for the wranguis' borghe strekin' and follouing of the said'
Roule

Eodem die Accedens ad barram alexander mar' et protestatus fuit
in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu decim s' sibi annuatim
debit' de quadam terra penitus vasta Jacente in vico furcarum
ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Dauid prat ex australi
et terram Eduardi tope ex boriali et communionem viam regiam
versus oriens et lacum dicti burgi versus occidens ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius
processus Testibus Johanne cristes Ranisone et alexandro cristeson'
et alexandro Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Johannes Stiruelinge
capellanus ac procuratour altaris beate Katherine virginis de Abirdene
et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu quinque
s' sibi et dicto altari debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in
vico viridi inter terram Alexandri chamer de murchil ex boreali terram
Altaris beate marie magdalene ex australi Ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
ballivis in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam 3o die huius processus
Testibus Willelmo cuming patricio baxtar et alexandro allanson' seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram magister alexander fyf capellanus ac procurator
altaris beate marie virginis de Abirdene et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo
redditu ij s' sibi et dicto altari annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta quondam
Johannis club Jacente in le grene ex occidentali parte aqueductus inter terram
eiusdem quondam Johannis ex australi et terram quondam alexandri Kintor ex boreali
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam 3o die huius processus
Testibus Willelmo cuminge patricio baxtar et alexandro allanson' seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram patricius andirson procurator Willelmi andirson'
et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo reddito x s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam
terra vasta Jacente in le grene inter terram Johannis fawsid' versus
austrum in terram Andree masone versus boriam ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis
in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
Testibus Willelmo cuminge patricio baxtar et alexandro allansone seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram patricius andirson' procurator Willelmi
andirson' et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu vijor s' sibj
annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta quondam Johannis fauside Ad
Jacente in le grene inter terram Altaris Sancti Johannis ewangeliste ex
australi et terram thome quhit ex boreali Ad quam terram Accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in
Sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus
Willelmo cuminge patricio baxtar et Alexandro allansone seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus matheus nicholsone
capellanus ac procurator altaris beati petri et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo
Sex s' sibi et dicto altari annuatim debit' de quandam terra vasta Jacente
in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram magistri alexandri Waus
ex australi et terram Johannis myll ex boreali ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis
in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
Testibus Willelmo cuminge patricio baxtar et alexandro allansone seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Johannis Johannes Kynnynmond capellanus ac procurator
altaris beate Katherine virginis infra ecclesiam cathedralem Abirdonensis et protestatus
fuit pro vno annuo Redditu quinque s' sibi et dicto altari debit' de quibusdam
terris vastis in le grene inter terram hered' quondam Johannis thome ex australi
et croftum fratrum predicatorum ex boreali ad quas quidem duas terras accedens nichil
reperit distringibile terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentavit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus Johanne Waus
matheo toschow et Andrea nachty seriando

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per dominum matheum nicholsone
capellanum ac procuratorem altaris beati petri apostolorum principis productis
de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre vaste Jacentis
infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem
vici inter terram quondam Walteri pyot versus austrum et terram
quondam thome croudane versus boriam in defectu solucionis vnius
annuj Redditus xxti s' dicto domino matheo et altari prelibato
a longo tempore debit' et non solut' Et consequenter Idem dominus
matheus peciit a ballivis secundum formam suj processus precedentis
Juris et iusticie complementum Tunc Curia mature
auisiata decreuit per quod prefatus dominus matheus nomine procuratorio
dicti altaris possessionem et proprietatem dicte terre legittime recuperavit
In defectu solucionis dicti annuj Redditus Et hoc pro Judicio
datum fuit per ex ore Johannis Williamsone Judicatoris Curie
Teste Curia

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv
die aprilis Anno quo supra

the samyn day Richerde lundoris present thome gerdane In the court to
Jonhne Waus and was dischargit of borougange of v s' that he
was in obefor to the said' Jonhne for a par of splentis

the said' day Jonhne fraser was callit lauchfullie and nocht comperit to ansuer
to the burghe strekit apon him be Syme bannerman of ailsek for the
wranguis' haldin fra him of iiijor merkis and xx bollis of malt and meile
of the fermis and maile of the landis of torrinscho quharfor the balyeis
chargit Duncan straloche seriand' to pas' and tak ane distres' of the saide
Johnne and warne him to comper one monunday next hereftir to ansuer to the
said' borghe as the secunde say of proces' Ande latt the stres' agane
to borghe gif it be askit

Eodem die dictus Symon fecit constituit et creauit Johannem colison' et Willelmum
blinsele coniunctim et diuisim suos procuratores ad prosequendum Johannem fraser
pro iiijor marcis et xx bollis victual' secundum tenorem plegij super ipsum
porrecti promitten' de Rato et grato et cetera

The samyn day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' thomas
prat forspekar that Williame philp restis awand' to mastir
Walter leslie parsone of mennivire Sex pundis grotis be his
avne tongue grawnte quilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay
within terme of law

the saide day Elizabeth' Setone the relict of James leslie grantit that
thar was bot vj li' g' fynit be Wilyeam philpe to James leslie and
it was nocht in his testiment and scho was content that mastir Walter leslie persevit
the saide Some and gif the obligacion was maid apon' the said mastir Walter
scho was content he hed' the money and gif it was apon' the said' James that
scho and hir barnes suld' haue the saide money

In the balye Court of abirdene in the tolbutht of the samyn haldin
the xviij day of aprile the yer' forsaid' Comperit Williame
blinsel procurator to Syme' banerman and offerit him to follow Jonhne
fraser to ansuer to the borghe' strekit apone him be the said Symon
and Duncan straloche seriand that was chargit to warne the said Jhon'
to comper to ansuer to the saide borghe' was nocht present to preyf
his waring quharfor the said' procurator protestit quhat skath the
saide Symond' Sustenis herintill in do the saide officiaris defalt
he mycht haue remede of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxmo
die aprilis Anno quo supra

div.head:
Nomina assise ad Inquisicionem Andream
Jonhnesone
div.p:
Andreas murray senior Walterus auchneyf thomas chamer
Dauid mathesone Jacobus Kintor Richardus hill senior Dauid
prat Johannes portar henricus hourum Jacobus andirson thomas gardiner
Duncanus smitht Willelmus Dauison thomas litilJhon' Willelmus
Cryne Johannes andirson' et Johannes myll Jurati dicunt quod quondam
Andreas baxter consanguineus Andree Jonhneson lat obiit vltimo
vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis
de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex occidentali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis Culan ex australi ex vna et terram
Dauid prat ex boreali extendens a communi viam regia versus oriens ad
lacum eiusdem burgi versus occidens Et quod dictus Andreas Jonhneson'
est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam dicti Andree consanguinei suj
de dicta terra Et quod est legittime etatis Et valet nunc per annum
xx s' et valuit tempore pacis Et tenetur in capite de Suppremo
domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit in manibus
domini nostri Regis per duos menses aut eocirca In defectu veri
heredis Jus suum minime prosequentis

the saide day the balyeis assignit monunday cum viij dais to Will
nory to present' befor tham Jonhne andirson of clat to ansuer to
the borghe' strekit apon' him be Androw murray for the haldin fra
him of xv s' to Compt and rekning Ande falyeinge tharof thai
ordanit the said' William to ansuer to the said' Androw as law
will

The xxi day of aprile within the consalhous' of abirdene In presence of
the aldirman and diuers' of the consale Alexander menyeis Robert blinsel
Dauid menyeis Jonhne colison and Jhone of Culan grantit and oblist
tham to comper be tham self or' thar procuratoris befor our Souerane lord
and his Consal the thrid day of this next parleament to be
beginnyn the xxviij day of aprile instant and bringe with tham the generale
assedacion and commission of the wattiris landis and fischingis of the saide burghe
last maide and vndirly the decret of the lordis quethir the saide asse
dacion be of vaile or nocht for the escheving' of skathis and cessing'
of debatis amang nichtburis in the towne and als' be caus' a
part of the towne said' the saide assedacion was of vale and wthiris
it was nocht of vaile et cetera

In the balye court of Abirdene haldin within the tolbutht
the xxiij day of aprile the yer forsaid' Thomas prat
Jonhne Wormet Androw murray eldar Wilyeam blinsele
and William of Kintor was chosin and Suorne the gret aithe
to lyne lelely and treulie ale landis within this bvrghe quhil
the hed' court eftir the next michaelmes' day

the saide day the balyeis chargit Jonhne of cullane and philp Dunbrek
officiar at thar commawnd' chargit him be his wand' to pas' and se
the lynynge of ane pece of land' pertening to the ayris of vm
quhile thomas Scrogis merchand' with ane pece of land' perte
ning to the larde of grantuly and schew sic richtis and allegeance that
he knawis to Informe the lynaris to lyne the said' lande iustlie

The saide day it is appontit betuix ane nobile man sere
gilbert of Ketht of Inuerugy knicht one that ane part Ande Jonhne
andirsone sone and ayr to vmquhile Jonhne andirson' burges of
Abirdene one that vthir parte anent the clame of Sex merkis of annuell
clamit be the saide Jonhne of the landis of perteouthe pertening to the
said' knicht In manere and forme as eftir followis that is to say the said'
partiis sal comper befor my lorde of abirdene one monunday the
secund' day of maij next to cum in Edinburghe and the saide Jonhne
sal bringe his richtis and enteres that he has to the said' annuell
and schew to my lorde of abirdene and to quhome it ples' his lordschipe
to tak to him And' gif it be fundin be his lordschipe that the saide
Jonhne be lauchfully entirit in the saide annuell the saide knicht
sal caus' the saide Jonhne be pait of ix merkis for thre termes
annuell bypassit for the quhilkis the saide Jonhne pundit and let
the pundis to borghe' for the pament of the saide ix merkis to
be pait to the said Jonhne within x dais eftir it be decretit and de
liuerit be the said' lorde that the saide Jonhne is lauchfully entirit
In the said' annuell Rent the said' knicht fand' thomas prat
Souerte to the saide Jonhne be his hand' In presens of the aldirman
balyeis and diuers' of consall and communite of Abirdene et cetera
to the keping of the quhilkis bath the saide partiis ar' oblist be the fathtis of thar
bodiis

Eodem die gilbertus Waus de many fecit constituit et nominavit alexandrum
rede et dominum Willelmum muresone coniunctim et diuisim suos procuratores
legittimos ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum ab Andrea Waus decernentes
et de receptis acquitand' prosequend' et defendend' promitten' de Rato
et grato Cum ceteris clausulis procuratorij aliis necessariis et
oportunis

the samyn day Jonhne Kintor gilbertis of Kintorris Sone and
ayre oblist him be his hande to pay j barrell of salmond'
sufficient merchande gude to Jhone Wormet be mydsommire
next hereftir or within xv dais thareftir vnrepreuit for certan
redy money pait to him

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem secundo
die maij Anno quo supra

The samyn day Comperit sere William barbour' chaplane
of the cathederall kirk of Abirdone befor the balyeis sitande
in Jugement and said' he was nocht planteous' apone bierde
Williamsone that hed' strubulit him Ande he forgaf him the
rancoure of his hert and tuk him be the hande And' atour
the saide bernarde putt him in the townis will for the
strubulance commitit within the towne

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xvj die
maij Anno quo supra

the saide day William philp follouit the vif
of vmquhile Jonhne gregory for certan Somez corne and vthir
gudis and scho with alexander rede hir forspekar allegit scho was clede
with ane husbande and aucht nocht tile ansuer quhil his cuminge
and the saide alexander come Souerte that quhene Jonhne low cumis hame
he sal ansuer for his saide wyf to Williame philp in ony thinge
he said' to hed' to say till hir' as law will

the samyn day Williame philp drew his landis and gudis be his
avne hande to the balyeis to freithe releif and keip thame
skathtles of alcostis skathtis and dampnage that happinnis anent the
Sex li' g' avand' be him be to mastir Walter leslie eftir the
tenor of the ak obefor

the samyne day it was fundyne and deliuerit be ane assis'
alexander rede forspekar that gif William futhes walde sueir'
that he grantit nocht to Cum Souerte for demi nethis fischingis maile
of the midchingile for Williame blinsele that he suld' be fre of it
the quhilk aithe the said' William futhes suewir and suay was
quyt of the saide borrougange

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxvij die maij Anno quo supra

head.add: Anent the lotting of gudis taking be men of wer' et cetera

div.p:
the samyn day thomas prat ane of the avnaris of the barbora
of abirdene one that ane parte William gareache yongar and vthiris
his fallowis merchandis of the saide schip was content and grantit tile
stand' and abide at the finale decret Sentence and ordinance
of thir personis vndir writin sere Jonhne ruthirfurde aldirman thomas fyf
Jonhne Wormet Dauid matheson' William blinsele James colison'
Jonhne menyes and William Kintor anent the contrauersy and debate of
Certan gudis takin be mene of weire quhilkis sulde lott or nocht
In the first iiijor puncionis of wyne lottis the wenis drunkin be mene
of wer lottis the demi pip of the mastiris wyne lottis quhilk was drunkin
be the mene of weire Al gudis beinge vndir the ourloft avand' fraucht
to the skippar lottis Anent the iij barrelis saip sauld' alsmekile as was gevin
for the redschip of the hale schip and gudis suld' lott quhilkis we refer
to the writ Al gudis abevne the ourloft lottis nocht Alsua othir the schip
or the fraucht at the merchandis will quhilk ples' tham best suld'
lott Item the ij barrel of Saip sauld' be thomas farquhar lottis nocht
bot gif it may be present it be spendit apon' the profit of the schip and
gudis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem pennultimo die maij
anno quo supra

the quhilk day Comperit Symon bannerman of ailseike
and follouit Jonhne fraser of Stanywode xx barrelis of meile and malt and iiijor
markis of Siluer of the fermis of torrinschow be ane borghe quhilk
the said Jonhne denyit and the said borghe was put to ane suorne
assis' quhilkis riplie avisit deliuerit and fande the saide Jonhne fraser
avand' to the saide Symon' be his avne tonge gravnt xvij barrelis
of meile and malt ande fiwe merkis of Siluer Ande gif the said Jonhne
may preif ony thinge pait herof to the saide Symon' it salbe allowit
in the saide Jonhne Some to him quhilkis was deliuerit be the moutht
of thomas chamer forspekar of the saide assis' Ande philp Dunbrek
seriande at commawnde of the balyeis chargit the saide Jonhne be his
wande to remane within the tolbutht quhill he fande Souerte to
pay the saide Somez within terme of law

the saide day Jonhne lammyntone was quyt be ane assis' of the
xxvj s' g' and iij g' waringe follouit be patrik andirson' and the
said' patrik in Amerciament of the court for the wranguis' borghe strekin' tharanent

The saide day Androw Wentone follouit thomas mar' for the wranguis' haldin' fra
him of compt and rekning of iijxx li' g' and a pip of wyne that he sauld' in the firtht
be ane borghe strekit in the handis of philp Dunbrek quhilkis the saide thomas
denyit And' thareftir the saide borghe' was put tile the decisione of ane assis' quhilkis
riplie avisit fand' and deliuerit be thomas chamer forspekar that the saide thomez mar' sale
avis' with his aithe quhil friday that next cumis and that day gif he will suer'
the bodely aithe that he hes gevin and maid compt rekning and pament of the said' gudis
within iiijor s' g' to the saide Androw the said' borghe is of nay avale Ande gif he
makis nocht gude fatht thai fand' the said' borgez' availe

the saide day the aldirman and balyes assignit monunday cum xv dais to Jonhne low
to ansuer to the borghe strekit apon' his wyf be Williame philp anent
Certan Siluer and price corne et cetera contenit in his borghe as law wile

the samyn day Jonhne lammyngtone protestit that the occupacion' of ane rige liande in
futy be Jonhne colisone pertening to him as he allegit suld' turne him to nay
preiudice

the saide day henry hourvm was in Amerciament of the court for the wranguis' haldin
fra Sanct nicholes werk of xxxiiij d' Inglis d' and to pay it within terme of law

the saide he day the borghe' strekit apone Jonhne tuliboy be henry hourum for
the wranguis' haldin fra him of his parte of xviij d' Ilkan day to his costis
was fundyne of nayne availe
